title: Polymer Science & Engr I
description: An introduction to the chemistry, structure, and formation of polymers, physical states and transitions, physical and mechanical properties to polymer fluids and solids. Crosslisted with CHEM, ME, MSE, and PTFE 4775.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 2312 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CHEM 3411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHBE 2130 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHBE 2140 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
